title: Bitcoin hits $80,000 for the first time as crypto traders bask in Trump election victory
content: Cryptocurrencies extended their rally on Sunday, with bitcoin touching $80,000 for the first time ever.
summary: Cryptocurrencies extended their rally on Sunday, with bitcoin touching $80,000 for the first time ever.

title: What Trump's mass deportation plan would mean for immigrant workers and the economy
content: President-Elect Donald Trump says his mass deportation plan will go ahead. Hiring firms and labor economists have begun to weigh the damage.

title: '#EndtheFed': Elon Musk endorses plan to let presidents meddle with Federal Reserve after Trump election win

title: 'It's gross, it's unprofessional': Some LinkedIn users are being put off the platform by unsolicited flirtatious DMs

title: ChatGPT rejected more than 250,000 image generations of presidential candidates prior to Election Day

title: Europe cannot finance Ukraine war if Trump pulls U.S. out of the conflict, Hungary's Orban warns
